Key Match Events: Royce Lewis snapped a hitting streak with a two-run double after a near-grand slam was overturned
Byron Buxton is set to return to the Twins' roster soon
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Rocco Baldelli highlighted the victory as a momentum builder and mentioned the return of key players like Byron Buxton and Carlos Correa
The Twins remain in a competitive standings for the AL Wild Card
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins are three games ahead in the AL Wild Card race
The return of key players like Byron Buxton and Carlos Correa is significant for the team's playoff push
